duties_responsibilities.duty: Draft preliminary and final site plans utilizing AutoCAD Civil 3D.
Review project survey data to analyze existing site conditions and factors for development.
Prepare reports, opinions, and recommendations for the direction of the project, including hydrology/hydraulic studies and storm sewer reports.
Provide construction-related services such as permit applications, cut sheets, and quantity estimates.
Utilize AutoCAD Civil 3D and related engineering software packages to complete assignments on time and within prescribed standards.
Strong written and verbal communication skills when interacting with current staff members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Civil Engineering EIT or FE Highly Desired
